Title: Olive: An Instruction Following LLaMA Model For Odia Language
Abstract: the artificial intelliegence community is experiencing a profound impact from large language models  large language model  and the introduction of chatgpt and gpt-4 is prompting a reconsideration of the potential of artificial general intelligence agi . however most of the large language model are trained in english and other high resource languages resulting in the unavailability of large language model and its related technologies and services for many low resource languages. in india where only 10% of the population is proficient in english the need for large language model models adapted to regional languages becomes crucial.in this paper we emphasized the need for large language model for the low resource odia language by evaluating the available large language model supporting odia language. we describe the development process of the instruction tuning large language model model for odia. the developed instruction tuning odia large language model is available freely for research and non commercial purposes.
